languages.text: Убил{mf||а} святого, чтобы обрести его мощи.

languages.text: 你杀死了圣人，将他的遗体改造成了圣物。
languages.original_text: Killed the saint to turn his remains into a relic.

languages.text: Den Heiligen getötet, um seine Überreste in eine Reliquie zu verwandeln.
languages.original_text: Killed the saint to turn his remains into a relic.

traits.locale_text: Den Heiligen getötet, um seine Überreste in eine Reliquie zu verwandeln.

languages.text: Vous avez tué le saint pour faire de sa dépouille une relique.
languages.original_text: Killed the saint to turn his remains into a relic.

languages.text: Has matado al santo para convertir sus restos en una reliquia.

languages.text: 聖人を殺し、彼の遺骸を遺物に変えた。
languages.original_text: Killed the saint to turn his remains into a relic.

languages.text: Naaşından bir yadigâr elde etmek için azizi öldürdün.
